title: VAERS Symptoms Long Table Schema
description: Schema for symptoms data transformed from wide to long format

SYMPTOM.description: Coded symptom name from MedDRA or similar coding system

symptom_count.description: Number of times this symptom was reported for this VAERS_ID (usually 1)

source_file.description: Original CSV filename this record came from (e.g., '2024VAERSSYMPTOMS.csv')
